title: Mathbox for David A. Wheeler
content: This is the mathbox of David A. Wheeler, dwheeler at dwheeler dot com. Among other things, I have added a number of formal definitions for widely-used functions, e.g., those defined in ISO 80000-2:2009(E) _Quantities and units - Part 2: Mathematical signs and symbols used in the natural sciences and technology_ and the _NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions_ ~ http://dlmf.nist.gov/ .
